wordGroup: collision avoidance 碰撞避免，冲突避免
avoidance of double taxation 避免双重课税
congestion avoidance n. 拥塞避免

sentences.en: A person's health improves with the avoidance of stress.
sentences.cn: 一个人只要避免紧张，健康状况就会改善。

sentences.en: The perennial vegetation adjusts to the aridity by means of various avoidance mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 多年生植物会采用各种躲避机制以适应干旱。

sentences.en: Building large new hospitals in the bistate area would constitute a wasteful use of resources, on the basis of avoidance of duplicated facilities alone.
sentences.cn: 仅在避免重复设施的基础上，在双州地区新建大型医院就是对资源的浪费。
